snippet: Preliminary figures released on Thursday indicated that growth in Japan’s gross domestic product slowed to an annualized rate of 1.9 percent in the third quarter of 2013.
abstract: Preliminary figures indicate growth in Japan’s gross domestic product slowed to an annualized rate of 1.9 percent in the third quarter of 2013, down from 3.8 percent in second quarter.
lead_paragraph: Preliminary figures released on Thursday indicated that growth in Japan’s gross domestic product slowed to an annualized rate of 1.9 percent in the third quarter of 2013.

headline.main: After Strong Growth in First Half of 2013, the Japanese Economy Hits a Snag
headline.print_headline: After Strong Growth in First Half of 2013, the Japanese Economy Hits a Snag
